metadata.title: removing href from an SVG image that has an xlink:href

image.href: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='50' height='50' ><rect width='50' height='50' fill='red'/></svg>
image.xlink:href: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' width='50' height='50' ><rect width='50' height='50' fill='green'/></svg>
